doc.after: Sport activities are a national movement with half of the population actively participating in organised sporting activities The two main spectator sports are football and ice hockey Second to football horse sports have the highest number of practitioners who are mostly women Thereafter golf athletics and the team sports of handball floorball basketball and bandy are the most popular
